overview:
Scott oversees business operations, legal and finance at Artists & Instigators. Scott also handles all deal structuring and negotiation for Artists & Instigators. Scott formed Artists & Instigators internship program in 2007, which currently has over 60 alumni. Scott is currently a Board Observer for Packlate.com as well as a member of the Penn State Outreach Advisory Board. He is also a frequent venture capital speaker at Drexel University, Temple University and Penn State University.

Prior to joining Artists & Instigators, Scott worked at TMG Health, recognized by the INC 500 as one of the fastest growing privately held companies in the United States. Prior to working at TMG Health, Scott worked for over 6 years in the sports/entertainment marketing industry, most recently with Comcast Spectacor. Scott earned a Bachelor of Arts Degree from Penn State University and a Juris Doctorate and an MBA from Temple University. He resides in the Philadelphia suburbs with his wife and two children.
